ludus_roles_schema.description: Mapping of verified Ludus Ansible roles and collections to their variables

ludus_roles_schema.CRITICAL_DOMAIN_CONFIG_WARNING: IMPORTANT: Do NOT use 'domain:' configuration sections with ludus_child_domain or ludus_child_domain_join roles. These roles handle domain operations internally. The domain: { fqdn: prod.test.local, role: member } configuration is only for standard Ludus domain joining, not child domain scenarios.

ludus_child_domain.description: Create a child domain and domain controller using microsoft.ad.child_domain module
ludus_child_domain.author: ChoiSG (@_choisec)
ludus_child_domain.note: Must install from directory - not Ansible Galaxy. Do NOT use with primary-dc or secondary-dc roles when creating child domains.
ludus_child_domain.IMPORTANT_DOMAIN_CONFIG_NOTE: DO NOT include 'domain:' section in VM configuration when using ludus_child_domain role. The role handles domain creation internally. Example: Do NOT add 'domain: { fqdn: prod.test.local, role: member }' to VMs using this role.

dns_domain_name.description: The full DNS name of the child domain to create

domain_admin_user.description: Username of a domain admin for the parent domain

domain_admin_password.description: Password for the specified parent domain admin user

safe_mode_password.description: Safe mode password for the domain controller

parent_dc_ip.description: IP address of the parent domain controller

current_host_ip.description: IP address of the current host that will become the child domain controller

create_dns_delegation.description: Whether to create a DNS delegation that references the new DNS server. Valid for Active Directory-integrated DNS only

domain_mode.description: Specifies the domain functional level of the child domain. Cannot be lower than the forest functional level. Options: Win2003, Win2008, Win2008R2, Win2012, Win2012R2, WinThreshold, Win2025

reboot.description: Whether to reboot the host after domain controller installation if required

install_dns.description: Whether to install the DNS service when creating the domain controller

ludus_child_domain_join.description: Join a machine to the child domain created from ludus_child_domain
ludus_child_domain_join.author: ChoiSG (@_choisec)
ludus_child_domain_join.note: Must install from directory - required because Ludus backend doesn't support 3rd party domain/controllers
ludus_child_domain_join.IMPORTANT_DOMAIN_CONFIG_NOTE: DO NOT include 'domain:' section in VM configuration when using ludus_child_domain_join role. The role handles domain joining internally. Example: Do NOT add 'domain: { fqdn: prod.test.local, role: member }' to VMs using this role.

domain_admin_user.description: <user>@<domain> format. Use `administrator`, since ludus's domainadmin default user is not created with ludus_child_domain

domain_admin_password.description: <this is hardcoded now> always use password
